line.comment: * $consumer = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.Trade.FindConsumerV2': ware=$ware trader=$trader consumerRace=$consumerRace sector=$sector amountToExport=$amountToExport
* Heavy on performance due to FindStation:
* AI sees everything. Player cheats a bit also, for performance reasons.
* Trading stations and Pirate bases can always buy and sell.
* "find factory: buys" can return docks, "find factory: sells" cannot!!!

sval.val: $consumer = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.Trade.FindConsumerV2': ware=$ware trader=$trader consumerRace=$consumerRace sector=$sector amountToExport=$amountToExport
Heavy on performance due to FindStation:
AI sees everything. Player cheats a bit also, for performance reasons.
Trading stations and Pirate bases can always buy and sell.
"find factory: buys" can return docks, "find factory: sells" cannot!!!
